图表通过@ycharts https://t.co/lJo1xvbyO6

nodes.title:
1. Stocks: all-time highs
2. Home prices: all-time highs
3. Corporate bond yields: all-time lows
4. Mortgage rates: all-time lows
5. Fed: we need many more years of 0% rates and bond buying to boost asset prices & increase inflation.
6. Bitcoin: all-time highs
nodes.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text:
1.股票：创历史新高
2.房价：创历史新高
3、公司债收益率：创历史新低
4.按揭利率：创历史新低
5.美联储：我们需要更多年的零利率和债券购买来提振资产价格和通胀。
6.比特币：创历史新高

sharedContent.title: BREAKING: Facebook blocks Trump from accessing his accounts indefinitely, per Zuckerberg. "We believe the risks of allowing the President to continue to use our service during this period are simply too great." https://t.co/8iXbkgDV9O https://t.co/IGmHkieG8L
sharedContent.author: Alex Kantrowitz

localize.full_text: RT@Kantrowitz：Breaking：根据扎克伯格的说法，Facebook阻止特朗普无限期访问他的账户。“我们相信允许…的风险
localize.retweeted_status_full_text: 突破：根据扎克伯格的说法，Facebook无限期阻止特朗普访问他的账户。“我们认为，允许总统在此期间继续使用我们的服务的风险实在太大了。”https://t.co/8iXbkgDV9O https://t.co/IGmHkieG8L

localize.full_text: RT@Kantrowitz：Breaking：根據扎克伯格的說法，Facebook阻止特朗普無限期訪問他的賬戶。“我們相信允許…的風險
localize.retweeted_status_full_text: 突破：根據扎克伯格的說法，Facebook無限期阻止特朗普訪問他的賬戶。“我們認爲，允許總統在此期間繼續使用我們的服務的風險實在太大了。”https://t.co/8iXbkgDV9O https://t.co/IGmHkieG8L

nodes.title:
Inflation Expectations continue their vertical ascent, now 2.04% (5-year breakeven).

Fed minutes today: we want much higher inflation and will keep interest rates at 0% and buying bond to get there. https://t.co/lpeKv9qZZ9
nodes.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text:
通胀预期继续垂直攀升，目前为2.04%(5年盈亏平衡)。

美联储今天的会议记录：我们想要更高的通货膨胀率，并将把利率维持在0%，并购买债券来实现这一目标。https://t.co/lpeKv9qZZ9

通脹預期繼續垂直攀升，目前爲2.04%(5年盈虧平衡)。

美聯儲今天的會議記錄：我們想要更高的通貨膨脹率，並將把利率維持在0%，併購買債券來實現這一目標。https://t.co/lpeKv9qZZ9
